title: How the Off-Season Became the Skinny Season for the Perma-Lean Pro Peloton
content:
'It used to be about stuffing yourself, drinking, partying': The winter break was once a time to kick back and gain kilos. Here's why that changed.

Read the full article at How the Off-Season Became the Skinny Season for the Perma-Lean Pro Peloton on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
